revised_title: Surgical Care in Rural Villages: Challenges and Solutions
tldr: This article discusses the challenges of providing surgical care in rural villages and proposes a system where district hospitals serve as the center of the health care network. It emphasizes the importance of training village health workers and medical auxiliaries to perform simple surgical procedures and stabilize patients for transport to the district hospital. The article also highlights the need for adequate equipment and technology at each level of the health care system.
